1413800.name: Spinch - Soundtrack
1413800.description: Composer and producer Thesis Sahib (James Kirkpatrick) brings an energetic, eclectic mix of sounds to the world of Spinch. A blend of chiptune, hip hop, and circuit bending artistry from repurposed toys among other things, the soundtrack is the perfect complement to the retro psychedelic visuals in the game, thanks to the close collaboration of Thesis Sahib with game art creator and cartoonist Jesse Jacobs.
